html:
ALGEBRA I - QUIZ #8
Quadratic Functions & Factoring
Time Limit: 45 minutes		Name: _________________________
Period: _____ Date: __________
Score: _____ / 25 points

Instructions:
• Show all work for full credit
• Simplify all answers completely
• No calculators allowed
• Check your answers when finished

1. (3 points) Factor completely:

$$x^2 + 7x + 12$$


Answer: ________________________

2. (3 points) Solve for $x$:

$$x^2 - 5x - 6 = 0$$


Answer: $x = $ ________ or $x = $ ________

3. (4 points) Find the vertex of the parabola:

$$y = x^2 - 4x + 7$$

Hint: Use the vertex formula $x = -\frac{b}{2a}$


Answer: Vertex = ( ____ , ____ )

4. (4 points) Use the quadratic formula to solve:

$$2x^2 + 3x - 2 = 0$$

$$x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$$


Answer: $x = $ ________________

5. (3 points) Expand and simplify:

$$(x + 3)(x - 5)$$


Answer: ________________________

6. (4 points) Factor by grouping:

$$6x^3 + 9x^2 - 4x - 6$$


Answer: ________________________

7. (4 points) A ball is thrown upward with an initial velocity of 32 ft/sec from a height of 6 feet. The height $h$ (in feet) after $t$ seconds is given by:

$$h = -16t^2 + 32t + 6$$

When will the ball hit the ground? (Set $h = 0$ and solve for $t$)


Answer: $t = $ ________ seconds

⭐ Bonus (2 points):

Factor completely:

$$x^4 - 16$$


Answer: ________________________

Reference Formulas

Quadratic Formula: $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$     Vertex Formula: $x = -\frac{b}{2a}$     Difference of Squares: $a^2 - b^2 = (a+b)(a-b)$
